name: spintheweb
description: Spin the Web deals with the Webbase Ontology Language (WBOL)—pronounced like wobble /ˈwɒbəl/. Simply put, HTML describes a web page, WBOL, a web site; and, while HTML is interpreted by a client side web browser, WBOL, by a server side web spinner.
author: Giancarlo Trevisan <g.trevisan@keyvisions.it> (http://www.spintheweb.org)
